thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 62 of 7354
thread.title: DavidK

author: DavidK
title: DavidK
text: B&H Photo's shopping experience is the best I've run across. The item I wanted happened to be out of stock. The site let me select the option of being notified when the item was available. (The site also updated the estimated time of availability of the item when it turned out that it was a day late.) An email arrived when the item was available and I ordered it immediately.
